official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital losses an individual may deduct against ordinary income, and to adjust such amount for inflation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase, from $3,000 to $20,000 (and from $1,500 to $10,000 for a married individual filing a separate return), the limitation on capital losses an individual may deduct against ordinary income. Adjusts amounts for inflation.
